name: Highlight New emails in Outlook
description:
I find it difficult to differentiate new emails arriving in the Outlook Web client on my Macbook. The text is slightly bolder and there's a thin bar on the left edge. This is a particular issue using the Dark theme.

This new Userstyle simply adds a big, prominent yellow bar to the left edge of all new, unread emails.
additional_info: There aren't any reliably recurring classes used in the Outlook interface. Ultimately, I've used a CSS selector that targets any Aria-labels that begin with the Word 'Unread'. As far as I can tell, Outlook tags all emails this way.
